name: LOUD FLATLAND
description:
The game was created in a week for 🎃 Spooktober Jam 🎃

 A strange and absurd game with farm mechanics. You play as a farmer who has encountered a ghost. After the monologue, you realize that the ghost is not evil at all.

Controls

AD - move

Space - jump

W - harvest

musician - valentinocervinimusic (Soundcloud)

programmer - MYline media
